value.title: Set Up Power BI Data Gateway to Connect On-Premise Data Sources
value.excerpt: During this session, we will be discussing about how we can install Standard Data Gateway to connect with On-Premise Data sources like SQL Server.  In this session, we have taken an example of On-Premise SQL Server Database. I will explain step by step procedure to install a Gateway and then how we can

value.title: DAX! Uggg - Where do you start? | Power BI
value.excerpt: Not a coder? Don't understand DAX syntax? DAX can be intimidating and difficult to learn. Frustrating even! Learning DAX can make Power BI very rewarding. Adam has some resources to get you started in your journey.  Beginning the journey:  MS Learn: User DAX in Power BI Desktop (Free) https://docs.microsoft.com/learn/paths/dax-power-bi/

value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Marco Russo, from SQL BI, joins Patrick to look at how you can debug DAX using variables in Power BI. Marco helps to break down a DAX measure and show how you can see the results as you build it up to find where the problem is.  SQL BI https://sqlbi.com  DAX Formatter https://www.daxformatter.com/

value.title: Debugging a slow Power BI report with Phil Seamark
value.excerpt: Phil sits down with us to walk through his process in debugging a slow Power BI report. This uses some new features in Power BI Desktop as well as using DAX Studio to get further insights. value.title: Easily get an access token for the Power BI Embedded Playground
value.excerpt: You need an Embed Token for the Power BI Embedded Playground, but you don't want to write code. Adam shows you how to easily get an access token with no code using PowerShell.  Power BI Embedded Playground - https://microsoft.github.io/PowerBI-JavaScript/demo/ Power BI REST API - https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/rest/api/power-bi/
